content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The initial rental price is 600 Euros per month, which includes all utilities. Would you like to negotiate?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
Yes, I would like to negotiate. Can I ask you if you can lower the rental price?

I am looking for a place to stay long term and preferably for at least a year, is that possible?

Also, what is the process of renting the apartment and when do I have to pay the first month's rent?

If I agree to rent the apartment, what's the minimum length of the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I'm happy to negotiate with you. I am open to considering any reasonable offers.

The apartment is available for a one-year lease, with the possibility of renewing for another year.

The process of renting the apartment involves filling out an application form and providing proof of income. The first month's rent is due upon signing of the lease agreement.

If you agree to rent the apartment, the minimum length of the rental agreement would be one year.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
I understand. Thank you for your time. Let me think about it for a moment.

Can you tell me if there is a parking space included in the apartment?

Also, is there a possibility of installing a dishwasher in the apartment?

Thanks again for letting me come to see the apartment.

If I agree to rent the apartment, when would you expect me to move in?

And do you have any other questions or concerns from my end?

How much notice would you need if I wanted to end the lease early?

Thanks again for your time.

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns from my end or if there is anything else I can help you with.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
There is no parking space included in the apartment, but there is street parking available nearby.

As for installing a dishwasher, it may be possible, but it would require additional costs and we would need to discuss the details further.

If you agree to rent the apartment, I would expect you to move in within a week or two of signing the lease agreement.

As for notice if you wanted to end the lease early, the standard notice period is 30 days.
name: Ryanah Rahman
